DataElement.preferredName: Microscope Device Field of View Diameter Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The diameter of the microscope field, represented as a numeric value using millimeters (mm) as the unit of measure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Microscopic Findings Domain Microscope Device Field of View Diameter
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings._An optical instrument that uses a combination of lenses to produce magnified images of very small objects_The extent of an area that is visible._The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 5981653 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
